name: Piper
agent_background:
Piper is a truck driver for the Sons of Calydon. Apart from driving, she's also responsible for vehicle maintenance and other related jobs.
Her tiny stature, cute voice (though she always seems half-asleep when not driving), and adorably harmless appearance (though she's a shut-in who can't be bothered to take care of her own appearance) make it hard to imagine that she would have such a crazy driving style.
Usually, by the time she drawls out, "Hold~ on~ tight~," the truck is already barreling down the road.
Rumor has it, Piper is a driver who doesn't need brakes. Though riding with her is a terrifying experience, she will always get you where you need to go safely, and in the shortest time possible. Of course, "safely" doesn't include any trauma that may be induced.

Piper has many hobbies that don't seem to match her age, such as reading newspapers, buying lottery tickets, and collecting car magazines.
Piper's biggest wish is to live each day slowly and leisurely.

Note: Please keep in mind, Master, that this is also my wish.

basic_attack.name: Load Up and Roll Out
basic_attack.description: Unleashes up to 4 slashes, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge.name: Handbrake Drift
dodge.description:
A rapid dodge.

Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

dash_attack.name: Pedal to the Metal
dash_attack.description: Slashes enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.

dodge_counter.name: Power Drift
dodge_counter.description:
Unleash a downward smash attack in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

quick_assist.name: Brake Tap
quick_assist.description:
Launches a downward smash attack at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable during the attack.

defensive_assist.name: Emergency Brake
defensive_assist.description:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
This skill excels at parrying enemy attacks and reduces the consumption of Assist Points when the character is under intense attacks.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

assist_follow_up.name: Overtaking Maneuver
assist_follow_up.description:
Charge and slash enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

special_attack.name: Tire Spin
special_attack.description:
Press Special Attack to activate:
Piper spins and launches a sweeping slash around her, dealing Physical DMG.
Hold Special Attack to extend the skill duration, unleashing increasingly powerful spinning slashes and increasing the charge level of the skill up to 2 times.
If the skill is used after the first 3 hits of a Basic Attack, Dash Attack, or Dodge Counter, you can quickly activate Special Attack: Tire Spin of an increased charge level.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%

special_attack.name: One Trillion Tons
special_attack.description:
When Special Attack: Tire Spin is active, release Special Attack to trigger a downward smash attack based on the charge level of Special Attack: Tire Spin, dealing Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ex_special_attack.name: Engine Spin
ex_special_attack.description:
With enough Energy, continue holding EX Special Attack after Special Attack:
Tire Spin reaches maximum charge level to activate:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes around her and dealing massive Physical DMG.
This skill consumes Energy continuously for up to 3s.
During the skill activation, Anti-Interrupt level increases, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%

ex_special_attack.name: Really Heavy
ex_special_attack.description:
During EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, release EX Special Attack to activate:
Piper unleashes a downward smash attack, dealing massive Physical DMG.
If the duration of EX Special Attack: Engine Spin reaches its limit or Energy drops to 20, EX Special Attack: Really Heavy will automatically activate.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

chain_attack.name: Buckle Up
chain_attack.description:
Unleashes a powerful downward smash at enemies ahead in a large area, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

ultimate.name: Hold~ On~ Tight~
ultimate.description:
Rapidly spins, unleashing powerful spinning slashes at enemies in a large area ahead, followed by a downward smash, dealing massive Physical DMG.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

core_passive.name: Power Charge
core_passive.description: When Piper's EX Special Attack: Engine Spin or Ultimate hits an enemy, she gains one stack of power, up to a maximum of 20 stacks, lasting for 12s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. For every stack of Power, Piper's Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by 4%.

additional_ability.name: Synced Acceleration
additional_ability.description:
When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Piper has 20 or more stacks of Power, all squad members' DMG is increased by 18%

mindscape_cinema.name: Leisure Moment
mindscape_cinema.description: When Piper’s Special Attack: Tire Spin, EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, or Ultimate hits an enemy with a spinning slash, there is a 50% chance to gain an additional stack of Power. The maximum stack limit of Power is increased to 30.

mindscape_cinema.name: Motivation
mindscape_cinema.description: During Special Attack: Tire Spin and EX Special Attack: Engine Spin, Piper’s movement speed increases. When using Special Attack: One Trillion Tons, EX Special Attack: Really Heavy, or Ultimate to launch a downward smash that hits an enemy, the Physical DMG dealt by the move is increased by 10%. For every stack of Power, this buff is further increased by 1%.

mindscape_cinema.name: Truck Expert
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Refined Techniques
mindscape_cinema.description: Whenever a squad member inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, Piper recovers 20 Energy. This effect can trigger every 30s.

mindscape_cinema.name: Personal Hobbies
mindscape_cinema.description: Basic Attack, Dodge, Special Attack, and Chain Attack Lv. +2

mindscape_cinema.name: Mild Excitement
mindscape_cinema.description: Increases the duration limit of EX Special Attack: Engine Spin by 2s and extends the duration of Power by 4s.
